EmailTemplate.name: AP New EDD – Missort
EmailTemplate.subject: We have a new estimated delivery date for case {!Case.CaseNumber}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Australia Post
Case {!Case.CaseNumber}
Hi {!IF(ISBLANK(Contact.Preferred_Name__c),Contact.FirstName,Contact.Preferred_Name__c)},
Your delivery will arrive shortly
Thank you for your patience while we’ve been monitoring your delivery. We are happy to report that the tracking has updated, and you can now expect your delivery on or before {!IF(ISBLANK({!IF(ISBLANK(Case.EstimatedDelivery__c), '', TEXT(DAY(Case.EstimatedDelivery__c)) +" "+ CASE( MONTH(Case.EstimatedDelivery__c), 1, "January", 2, "February", 3, "March", 4, "April", 5, "May", 6, "June", 7, "July", 8, "August", 9, "September", 10, "October", 11, "November", "December" ) +" "+ TEXT(YEAR(Case.EstimatedDelivery__c)))}), '', TEXT(DAY({!IF(ISBLANK(Case.EstimatedDelivery__c), '', TEXT(DAY(Case.EstimatedDelivery__c)) +" "+ CASE( MONTH(Case.EstimatedDelivery__c), 1, "January", 2, "February", 3, "March", 4, "April", 5, "May", 6, "June", 7, "July", 8, "August", 9, "September", 10, "October", 11, "November", "December" ) +" "+ TEXT(YEAR(Case.EstimatedDelivery__c)))})) & " " & CASE( MONTH({!IF(ISBLANK(Case.EstimatedDelivery__c), '', TEXT(DAY(Case.EstimatedDelivery__c)) +" "+ CASE( MONTH(Case.EstimatedDelivery__c), 1, "January", 2, "February", 3, "March", 4, "April", 5, "May", 6, "June", 7, "July", 8, "August", 9, "September", 10, "October", 11, "November", "December" ) +" "+ TEXT(YEAR(Case.EstimatedDelivery__c)))}), 1, "January", 2, "February", 3, "March", 4, "April", 5, "May", 6, "June", 7, "July", 8, "August", 9, "September", 10, "October", 11, "November", "December" ))}
A sorting error led to your parcel arriving at a facility outside of your area however our team members have already picked up on this and manually forwarded it to the correct location.
Errors like this can occur due to damaged or unclear labels and barcodes, or automated sorting machines reading the wrong area of the address label. Missorts are rare, and are rectified as soon as they are detected. We are sorry for the concern this delay may have caused and can assure you that the delivery is back on track.
Your case will be closed now that your delivery is on the way. You can continue to monitor the tracking for further updates – click here to see delivery options and notification preferences for this parcel.
Australia Post
